Source.Name: libgltf
Source.Description: libgltf is a library for rendering glTF models -- development glTF, the GL Transmission Format, is the runtime asset format for the GL APIs: WebGL, OpenGL ES, and OpenGL. glTF bridges the gap between formats used by modeling tools and the GL APIs.
